attributes.action: Allow us to die in peace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Assisted suicide - If we can put murderers, rapists and other infestations to sleep with a simple injection, then why not let those who are dieing of an incurable disease have the right to have the same.  Please help me I dont want to die knowing i am going to suffer either physically or emotionally.  I dont want my family to see me die in pain.  I dont want to be bed ridden.  I dont want to be a burden to my family.  When i grow old I just want to die peacefully.  What about you?  How do you want to die?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
